long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn with Knowsome- Turn unproductive moments during your day into learning events.
Knowsome extension automatically identifies unproductive moments and turns them into learning events. With Knowsome learning is organized, short and to the point.

Knowsome is not about getting a degree or achieving expert level. Instead, Knowsome's Conversation-level approach, focuses on enhancing your general knowledge and expanding your horizons. Not only is it fun to learn with Knowsome, it will also provide you with endless intriguing conversation starters.
----------
Permission:
1. "notifications" - Knowsome will send you notifications when you are wasting time. 
2. "Tabs" - Knowsome will monitor the time you spend on predefined "procrastination" websites, once it identifies a "time wasting event" it will notify you.   
3. "Storage"- Knowsome will store session cookies and an unidentifiable user identifier to send personalized learning content based on prior learning at the Knowsome website. No data will be shared with 3rd party sites.
----------
We respect your privacy, please find our End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy below.

https://www.itsknowsome.com/eula

https://www.itsknowsome.com/privacy

-----------

If you wish to remove the Knowsome extension from your browser:

1. Click "Customize and Control" (the three horizontal dots) on the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
2. Choose   > More tools > Extensions.
3. On to the extension you want to remove, click Remove.
4. To remove the extension,  locate Knowsome on the list of installed extensions and click the trash icon.

For additional question or feedback, please contact us on: info@itsknowsome.com .

Enjoy Knowsome!
